name: Brushfire North
tag_list: computers, programming, software, strategy, support, websites, website-development, mobile-apps, mobile-web
overview:
Brushfire North provides custom software and web programming to a variety of small and large businesses in North America.

We work with advertising agencies to produce marketing related websites, micro-sites, games or software as well as build custom LOB applications and Content Managed websites.

We also have an enterprise level Inventory Management System that is currently being used by one of Toronto’s largest fruit and vegetable wholesalers. The Inventory Management System tracks real-time inventory, truck tracking and payments for the food service industry and can be purchased and customized for a variety of different businesses that operate in the food service industry.
